title: 9/1 best Renovated 1 BedRm Apt. 2nd FL in house
posting_body: ['The apt will be available on 9/1/2022.', 'Elegantly furnished.', 'Before responding to this email please read it carefully.', 'View only by appointment.', 'Appointment only gives out after you provide information of full name, cell #, employment/income, credit score...', 'Please Google Midwood, Brooklyn to know the peaceful historical neighborhood.', 'The trees line up along the streets.', 'Gardeners care for the gardens in front of each house.', 'Many multimillion-dollar houses are 3 min walking distance away from this house.', 'You may jog or ride a bicycle in the morning or on weekends.', 'Along the way, you hear birds chirping...', 'Convenient transportation and shopping.', '2 block walk to #2, 5 Train and commercial center including Target where Brooklyn college is next to it.', 'Six banks, Starbucks, fast food, restaurants, whatever you like or need.', 'If taking the #2, or #5 train three stops to DownState medical Center and Kings county hospital, 20 min downtown Brooklyn.', '30 min Lower Manhattan financial district.', 'You may change to multiple trains at Atlantic Av-Barclays Cr. station.', 'Or walking to Q train Ave.J station.', 'It takes you 30 min to Union Square.', 'Many bus routes within walking distance:', 'B44, B41, B9. B6, B11 to reach all of Brooklyn.', 'This one-bedroom Apt is in a house.', "It has a spacious living room 14'x 11' (150 SF)with a built-in closet, Three large windows facing two directions: two facing east, and one facing south, a bedroom is 9' x 11' plus a built-in closet, a south-facing large window.", 'As shown in the pics both rooms have sunlight streaming into rooms.', 'They are bright and airy.', 'New OKA wood floor.', 'Beautiful new first-class bathroom.', 'The kitchen is equipped with advanced new electric appliances, an EM Induction burner, a microwave Even, an Instant Pot that combined the functions of a pressure cooker, a slow cooker, a rice cooker, and many more.', 'The rent is $1400 Security deposit is required.', 'Serious inquiries only.', 'Washer and dryer in the house.', 'Attention: Won\'t respond to emails merely inquire about availability or say "I love this Apt!".', 'No Fee.', 'As long as the poster appears here the apt will be available on 9/1/2022.', 'Thanks for reading.']
